snippet: An elderly widow in Manhattan was stabbed and forced to leave her apartment after a fire. Then her son died. She pays a maintenance fee to keep her ruined apartment in her name while it is repaired.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York helps pay maintenance fees on the apartment of elderly Manhattan resident Isabella Rivera of Manhattan.
